The Journey

I am a self-taught software engineer from Morocco. I dropped out of college because I learned faster and better on my own terms. I've spent the last 6+ year figuring out how the world works by trying to build parts of it myself.

  • Freelancing: Spent years solving technical problems for people all over the world It was my school.
  • Web3: Got deep into decentralized tech, won some hackathons, and contributed to some big blockchains.
  • Bootstrapping: Tried to build my own products. Most failed, but they taught me more than any course ever could.
  • The Arabic Leetcode: Spent 2 years building a platform to help others learn what learned. It was one of the hardest things I've built.

I don't have a fixed plan. I'm just here to build, learn, live, and see what happens next. What will happen will happen.
